enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Co-Chair Jukka Uosukainen (Finland) said many paragraphs in the draft decisions remain bracketed.
On text concerning integration and mainstreaming in planning processes, the G-77/CHINA preferred to bracket the reference to mainstreaming.
Parties agreed to forward the draft decision on capacity building in countries with economies in transition, and the bracketed draft decision on capacity building in developing countries to SBI.
